name: Missing firstName in request body

steps.name: Given I have a new user data located at "features/data/user_data2.json" with generated email
When I send a POST request to "/user/create" with app id: "6636324525a5b823ed8a1d31"
Then the response status code should be 400
And the response should contain error "BODY_NOT_VALID" with value "'firstName': 'Path `firstName` is required.'"

fullName: Api testing for create endpoint: Missing firstName in request body
